The graphics of this game is Good-looking maybe not the best by today standards but it's still good and the facial animations are nice to have, The game design is interesting but outdated in many aspects, The voice acting is mostly bad with G-Man being the exception, The story is pretty neat but the gameplay is nothing to brag about.

Просто отличная игра.

+  Хорошая физика, головоломки, хоть и не сложные, большинство глав отличаются друг от друга не только визуально, но и геймплейно, хоррорная глава Рейвенхольма, довольно высокая сложность(на сложном,хотя может это я ракал), музыка хоть и довольно редкая, но отличная(вспомните хоть triage at dawn или something secret steers us), грави-пушка черт побери

- или +- уже совсем не впечатляющая графика, какая-та затянутость в предпоследних главах ну и стрельба: почти у всего оружия нет отдачи, на комбайна на высокой сложности на чуть ли не 2/3 обоймы автомата тратить

Даже щас в игру можно играть и получать какое-то удовольствие)
Пока

Half life 2 improves upon every aspect of half life, 
STORY: the story is one of the best in the business even to this day the twists would leave ya hanging and wanting more of half life, the story is told through gordon's perspective which immerses you into the story more,you can actually feel that you are there and present in the scene, the npc's feel alive and you can actually tell that they are alive and they have their own mind 
GAMEPLAY: the gameplay is superb u have many guns and consumables that you get and earn through the game including sub machine guns,shotguns,rocket launchers etc. the mechanics suite the game and go around with the general vibe
A.I: For me without good A.I a game can't be good and in the A.I aspect the game is one of the best in the gaming history, The enemies flank and they have good aim,The general combine have not that good aim and the elite combine have near perfect aim
MISCLANNEOUS: the pacing is the game is outstanding and the puzzles are excellent and can sometimes confuse you a lot 
VERDICT: In summary, the game is one of the best pc games ever released and every pc gamer should atleast play the game atleast for one time 10/10

It may have been decent when it first released, but that was then. It hasn't aged well. Frustrating level design, none stop enemies and worst of all, physics. Physic based puzzles have never been fun in any game and this one is no exception. All of that and the lack of a conclusion to the series means there is zero reason to play this in 2020.

haha crowbar go clang clang

Everything people have said about this classic is true, and it still holds up after all this time. At its core, it's a puzzle game with guns. The game doesn't hold your hand or yell at you to do things like a lot of modern games, instead it relies on its design and art direction to gently guide you into what you need to do next, giving you the tools and trusting you'll figure it out on your own.

Half-Life 2 (2004)

I don't even need to talk about this game. This one is steam in the making. Gordon Freeman fighting the Combine with his trusty crowbar. I believe they gave the game a graphics update a few years back, that's nice. The jokes for Half-Life 3 - yeah. Don't expect that anytime soon! Amazing shooter, good story and over-all fun game to explore.

9/10
